headline: Is Philip Morris International Inc. (PM) the Best FMCG Stock to Buy According to Billionaires?
summary: We recently published a list of 12 Best FMCG Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE:PM) stands against other best FMCG stocks to buy according to billionaires. Historically, the consumer-packaged-goods (CPG) industry outperformed most of the other industries, mainly due […]

headline: 10 Stocks of the S&P 500 ETF Up More Than 20% in Q1
summary: While many stocks in the S&P 500 ETF posted dismal performance in the just-concluded quarter, we discuss some that rose by more than 20%.

headline: Philip Morris pursues smoke-free ambitions in the US
summary: The company has named a new chief commercial officer as it debuts Iqos heat-not-burn devices in Texas and continues seeing strong demand for Zyn nicotine pouches.
